ComicInfo.Title: Dream!; The Garcon; Out of Focus; Epitaph!; Destiny's Double Deal!
ComicInfo.Summary:
A man is abducted and taken into the dank bowels of the city where he is tortured by a strange cult and then released.
Edgar Clay is distraught that his faithful wife Miriam fell to her death from a cliff when he was away at work. Overcome by lonely grief, he visits the cemetery she is buried at to feel consoltation. As night falls, he sees the silent dead rising from their graves rewriting their epitaphs to reveal the truths about how they lived their lives. He's shocked to see Miriam write her epitaph revealing that she fell off the cliff waiting her lover!
